description: Manages resource limits on Apache CloudStack based clouds.

domain.description: Domain the resource is related to.

api_url.description: URL of the CloudStack API e.g. https://cloud.example.com/client/api.

api_secret.description: Secret key of the CloudStack API.

api_region.description: Name of the ini section in the C(cloustack.ini) file.

project.description: Name of the project the resource is related to.

limit.description: Maximum number of the resource. Default is unlimited C(-1).

account.description: Account the resource is related to.

api_key.description: API key of the CloudStack API.
